item.title: I-17 North - Exit 201 Offramp at US-60
item.description: I-17 North - Exit 201 offramp at US-60. Turn left for US-60/To Grand Ave.

item.title: I-17 North - Exit 201
item.description: I-17 north at Exit 201 - US-60 West/Thomas Road/Grand Ave. US-60 west leaves I-17 north here.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-74/To I-17
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-74 East/To I-17. Use AZ-74 east to connect to I-17 at the north edge of the Phoenix Metro. area.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-74
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-74, To I-17. AZ-74 cuts across the north end of the Phoenix Metropolitan Area between US-60 on the west to I-17 on the east.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 143
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 143A - I-17 North/Flagstaff and Exit 143B - I-17 South.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 143 AB
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 143 A-B - I-17 North/Flagstaff/I-17 South.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exits 143 A-C
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 143C - 19th Ave./Grand Ave. Also approaching Exit 143AB - I-17 North/Flagstaff/I-17 South

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 145B and Exit 143 AB
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 145B - 3rd St. (HOV). Approaching Exits 143AB - I-17 North/Flagstaff and I-17 South.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 150
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 150A - I-17 North/Flagstaff/US-60 West/I-10 West Truck Route. US-60 west leaves I-10 west here.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 150B and 150A
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 150B - 24th St. Approaching Exit 150A - I-17 North/US-60 West/Flagstaff/I-10 West Truck Route. US-60 leaves I-10 west at I-17. Continue west on I-10 for Los Angeles and the Sky Harbor Airport.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 150A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 150A. Wickenburg bound traffic use US-60 west at Exit 150A.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 150B and 150A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 150B - 24th St. Approaching Exit 150A - I-17 North/US-60 West/Flagstaff/I-10 West Truck Route. I-10 continues west to Los Angeles. US-60 exits I-10 here and joins I-17 through downtown Phoenix.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 150A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 150A - I-17 North/US-60 West/Flagstaff/To I-10 West Truck Route. Hazardous cargo must use I-17 north through downtown Phoenix.

item.title: AZ-101 West - Exit 23 and Exit 24
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West at Exit 24 - 19th Ave. Approaching Exit 23 - I-17/Phoenix/Flagstaff. All of the loop highways around Phoenix have different color shields on the older signs. AZ-101 Loop has a blue shield.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop West Approaching Exit 24 and Exit 23BC
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West approaching Exit 24 - 19th Ave. Approaching Exit 23 - I-17/Phoenix/Flagstaff.

item.title: I-17 South at Exit 214C - AZ-Loop 101 Split
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C - AZ-101 Loop Split.

item.title: Blue AZ-101 Loop On I-17 South Exit 214C
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C offramp. Use right lanes for AZ-101 Loop West

item.title: I-17 South at Exit 214C Offramp
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C offramp. Use right lanes for AZ-101 Loop West

item.title: I-17 South at Exit 214C
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C - AZ-101 Loop. I-17 continues south to Phoenix.

item.title: US-60 East at AZ-74
item.description: US-60 east at AZ-74 east to I-17.

item.title: US-60 East Approaching AZ-74
item.description: US-60 east approaching AZ-74 east to I-17.

item.title: US-60 East Approaching AZ-74
item.description: US-60 east approaching AZ-74 east to I-17.
